byline.contributor: Sewell Chan contributed reporting from London, and Ivan Nechepurenko from Moscow.
byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and HWAIDA SAAD

abstract: Escalation of air strike campaign in rebel-held areas of northern Syria is firmly underway, with Russian and Syrian government forces carrying out second straight day of increased bombardment.
lead_paragraph: Humanitarian agencies warned of growing violations of international law — particularly what they called a pattern of deliberate attacks on hospitals.
snippet: Humanitarian agencies warned of growing violations of international law — particularly what they called a pattern of deliberate attacks on hospitals....

headline.main: Life Is Turned ‘Upside Down’ as Jets Pound Rebel-Held Syrian Cities
headline.print_headline: Life Is Turned ‘Upside Down’ as Bombing Escalates in Syria
